title: Workout Companion
description: An app that allows users to search by body part and receive a list of exercises. Built with React, Material UI, and ExerciseDB API

title: IMDB
description: An IMDb app used to search for films, built with the OMDb API, React, and Material UI.

title: Travel Advisor
description: A travel advisor app built with React, Google-Map-React, Google Maps API, Open Weather API, Travel Advisor API, and Material UI.

title: CoronApp
description: This application will provide users with a curated feed of COVID-19-related news and social media content.

title: Weather App
description: This is a Weather Dashboard built with HTML,CSS, Javascript, and the OpenWeatherMap API.

title: Half-Time
description: This is a fantasy soccer app, as well as a general soccer hub. Built with React, and various API's.
